author: Simon Difford
description: Bourbon, peach and mint flavours combine harmoniously in this cooling cocktail.
name: Georgia Mint Julep
recipeIngredient: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: ADD first 5 ingredients to glass and two-thirds fill with crushed ice
CHURN (stir) with bar spoon and then FILL glass with more crushed ice
TOP with soda, briefly stir and serve
